snippet: “To Life!: Celebrating 50 Years of ‘Fiddler on the Roof’ With Sheldon Harnick” presents songs cut from the original “Fiddler on the Roof.”
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert To Life!: Celebrating 50 Years of Fiddler on the Roof With Sheldon Harnick, featuring songs that were cut from Broadway opening of Fiddler on the Roof in 1964, at 92nd Street Y.
lead_paragraph: “To Life!: Celebrating 50 Years of ‘Fiddler on the Roof’ With Sheldon Harnick” presents songs cut from the original “Fiddler on the Roof.”

headline.main: Review: ‘To Life!,’ a Show of Songs Cut From ‘Fiddler on the Roof’
headline.print_headline: Show’s Songs With a Sunrise and Sunset
